de.grau.organizer.classes

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.realm.RealmObject
      • de.grau.organizer.classes.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.realm.RealmModel

    public class Event
extends io.realm.RealmObject
    Created by Attix on 9/22/16. Base Class of an Event, it holds all needed Data to work with an particular Event Both tags and notes are lists of RealmObjects (1..n) Upon creation an event is filled with dummy data

      • getTime

        public int getTime(Event.DateTime dateTime,
                   int calendarUnit)
        Returns an integer representing the data field request Options are START and END and a given int from Calendar
        Parameters:
        dateTime - from enum of this class
        calendarUnit - int from Calendar Konstant (Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY)
        Returns:
        int representing requested value of requested date
